Translations.Text: Garasen, ddewioen ilmeeiyen i nitni, amzun d tiyaqutin mesiuoen
Zzin, kra $er kra, pmesteqsayen
Nnan d: "ni$ nella, zik, di twacult nne$, nugad
I$at a$ Oebbi, Isellek a$ seg ujajie n tmes
Ni$ nella, zik, nepnuju $uoeS. Neppa, s tidep, d A$eyyat Ipeunun
Ihi, ccfu ar kecc, s l$it n Mass ik, ur telliv d agezzan, ne$ d aoehbani
Ne$, ad inin: "d amedyaz. A naoou asali s akud
Ini: "gganit! Nek, yidwen, seg wid ipganin
Ne$ d tirga nnsen i sen iumoen aya, ne$ nitni d agdud izegren tilas
Ne$ ad inin: "isnulfa t id". Xaii! Ur uminen
Ihi, a d awin ameslay i t icban, ma d tidep ay ssawalen
Ne$ pwaxelqen seg ulac, ne$ d nitni ay d ixellaqen
Ne$ xelqen tamurt akked igenwan? Xaii, ur pputebbten
Ne$ $uosen lexzayen n Mass ik, ne$ nitni d imvebboen
Ne$ saan sellum ad ssemeessen, segs. Ihi, win islan segsen, a d iawi adabu n uuee
Ne$ i Neppa tullas, i kunwi arrac
Ne$ tessutrev asen taqdiat, fellasen d iilaba eeayen
Ne$ $uosen tabavnit, d$a la pparun
Ne$ b$an ad andin? D wid ijehlen ara ipwaiifen
Ne$ saan oebbi, ur Nelli d Oebbi? Gedha s Oebbi, seg wayen pcaraken
Lemmer ad walin amur igenni i$li, ad as inin: "d asigna i izdin
Ihi, eoo iten, ard mlilen d wass n ssiaqa nnsen
Ass, ideg ur asen d teppawi acemma, tandit nnsen; ur asen illi usettao
I wid idensen, s tidep, aaaqeb nniven, maca tegwti degsen, ur eoin
Eubeo i wayen d Ieudd Mass ik, aql ak, s tidep, ger wallen nneÂ£. Sbuccaa s ccekoan Mass ik, mara d tekkrev
Sbuccaa iT deg iv, u mara xsin yitran
S yitri mara ixeppi
Ur innetlaf, ur i$liv umeddakwel nnwen
Ur d iqqao akken i s ihwan
D aweeei kan, id ippuweeean
Islemd it bab n tezmert iqwan
D bab n tezmert irs ed
u neppa di lejba aalayen
Sinna iqeob ed, ippucengel
atan tasurift n sin ixtucen, ne$ ur tebbwiv
D$a iweeea i umdan iS, ayen iweeea
Ur iskaddeb wul deg wayen iwala
Day a t tnaqwmem, $ef wayen iwala
Ni$ ieoa t di trusi s nniven
ar tedxwent n talast
u$uo illa leonan usemlili
Mi tesbur tedxwent ta$wlaft
ur iwweonenni yieoi, ur izgir
Ni$ iwala kra issekniyen imeqwoaeanen, n Mass is
Twalam Allat akked Lauzza
Akked Manat, tis krav nniven
Day i kunwi ddkeo, i Neppa nnta
Wagi, ihi, d beiiu aneeyaf
Wigi d ismawen kan i sent tefkam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen. Ur sent d Issers Oebbi kra udabu. Iiafaoen kan nnwaya, akked wayen cehwant teowiein. Ni$ tusa ten id nnhaya s$uo Mass nnsen
Aani, i umdan, ayen issaram
Tamezwarut akked tneggarut, n Oebbi
